modName: Nonor - A standalone follower quest mod
summary: A "standalone" follower / quest/ player home mod
descriptionHtml:
[size=15pt][b]Description[/b][/size]

This is my first quest/player home mod, also my second standalone follower mod!

It only has 1 straight forward quest to get your delicious follower Ellean Crystaline. Her place can also be a player home.
[size=3]
[b][u]Background Story[/u][/b][/size]

In a far away land from Skyrim, there is a forgotten island called Nonor, where an Elven stronghold has been ruling for centuries . The island was originally inhabited by Nords, but it was took over by the fleeing troops of [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Maormer]Maormer[/url] (aka Sea elves) after The War of the Isle in 3E 110. 

The Maormer are mers who came from an island far southwest of Tamriel. After a freak storm which was believed to be created by the the Psijic Order during the battle, the Maormer navy was devastated and those who survived were scattered across the sea. Some of the ships found their way to Nonor, a small Nordic island far from the shores of Skyrim. Political arrangements was made to erase the Nordic island from the maps by Maormer spies, who infiltrated into the Thalmors, so that the squad of Maormer navy could recover while exploiting the Nordic peasants on the island.

The captain of the squad Aearonor Crystaline crowned himself “King of Nonor” with the support of his men and married a Nord woman called Valin. Aearonor, is still alive now, due to the long lives of mers, but Valin was long dead. Aearonor did not care about that, as all he wanted was an heir to 
succeed his throne after he conquered Skyrim. Ellean Crystaline is the daughter of Aearonor, who has been treated like a puppet since she was born. She hated this idea and has been plotting to stop his father.

Now Ellean has escaped from the island to Skyrim, seeking for help.


[size=6][u][b][center]To start the quest, talk to Ellean's servant in Winking Skeever, Solitude[/center][/b][/u][/size]

[color=red][size=15pt][b]Requirements[/b][/size]

[/color][b][u]Dawnguard[/u][/b]

[b][u]The Skeleton ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS

[/url]Hair ----> [/u][/b][b][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[/u][/b]A little bit of dependency ;D

[size=5pt][b]Known Issue that I don't know how to fix[/b][/size]

1. Ellean doesn't follow even after you tell her to follow until you go back to Skyrim and fast travel or enter a cell

[size=15pt][b]Credits[/b][/size]

kofman77 for his great support and Bosmer Ceremonial Lingerie, also Calys for the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51569/?]Bosmer Ceremonial Armor[/url] meshes and textures

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5279888]shuryanc[/url] for his lip sync files

[url=http://www.ivona.com/]Ivona.com[/url] for great voices

Numerous online CK tutorials from many different authors


[color=yellow][size=15]Endorse and post your screenshot if you like it![/size]
[/color]
